type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike, trample, reach
[i]Regalia[/i] – Ephraim, Wielder of Twins gets +3/+3 for each legendary Equipment you control.
[i]Sol Luna[/i] – Whenever a creature you control attacks, if it is equipped with a legendary Equipment, You gain X life, and they get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that creature's base power.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Ephraim deals combat damage to a player, draw a a card for each Equipment attached to him.
